problem_text_cn: 如图,一顶圆锥形的圣诞帽,底面半径是8cm,若沿母线AB剪开,母线AB长是20cm,若不计接缝,不计损耗,则制作这样的一顶圣诞帽至少需要的纸板面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, a cone-shaped Christmas hat, the bottom radius is N_0, if cut along the generatrix AB, the length of the generatrix AB is N_1, if the seam is not counted, and the loss is not counted, the minimum cardboard area required to make such a Christmas hat is ()
raw_answer: 解:制作这样的一顶圣诞帽至少需要的纸板面积是π×8×20=160πcm^{2},故选C．
